alert.note: Alert for Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 1:40AM EST until February 18 at 3:38PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Binghamton NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New York... Canisteo River At West Cameron affecting Steuben County. For the Chemung River Basin...including Campbell, West Cameron, Lindley, Corning, Elmira, Chemung...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Canisteo River At West Cameron. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Flooding spreads in to the agricultural areas along the river from West Cameron to the Village of Cameron. At 18.0 feet, Portions of Canisteo-River Road (CR-119) are flooded near the bridge west of the Village of Cameron. A few farms nearest the river are isolated by flood waters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by 2:30 AM to a crest of 17.5 feet around 3 AM. It will then fall below flood stage by 7 AM. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
